about_the_game:
Amidst lapping waves and an air of adventure, set sail on a musical odyssey with the soundtrack to Iridescence! 🌊✨

Composed by Sean Pack, this mesmerizing score captures the whimsy of a mysterious new friend, the hardship of personal struggle, and the sweeping orchestrations of an epic journey between land and sea. Featuring live-recorded vocal performances and a blend of familiar and enigmatic instrumentations, each track immerses you deeper into the enchanting world of Iridescence. 🎶
